          <title>
            <string language="en">Compositions of gases in air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufbau der Gase in einer Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compositions des gaz en air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Composições dos gáses no ar</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">These pie charts illustrate different compositions of gases found in air.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Kreisdiagramme veranschaulichen

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes circulaires circulaires illustrent
différentes compositions des gaz trouvés en air.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas cartas de torta ilustram composições

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi diagrammi a torta illustrano le

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα πιτών επεξηγούν τις διαφορετικές

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas cartas de empanada ilustran diversas
